body_content.explanation: weighing much more than normal, and needing a lot of effort to move or lift:
examples: Super-heavy trucks are to be allowed on the country's roads.
Superheavy backpacks may harm children's growing bones and joints.

body_content.explanation: A super-heavy element is one that has a higher atomic mass (= the amount of substance contained in the smallest unit of a particular chemical element) than uranium:
examples: Not many labs have the necessary equipment to do work on super-heavy elements.
